name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby> ランガ

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, reveal 1 "Skysavior Prayer" or "Fusion" in your hand.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 "Soleil the Skysavior Angel" or "Lua the Skysavior Angel" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
